Wabberspace.rscadd: A new forest garrison role, Ruffian, a youngling role primarily built around being an aide to the Forest Garrison, with a mixture of Orphan and Ranger skills.
A unique orphan halt used only by Ruffians.

Wabberspace.balance: Renames Forest Infantry to Forest Ravager, and replaces their Axe skills with Whips & Flails, and gives them a heater shield and military flail, as well as rearranging their stats to be far slower, and far more durable/enduring, and gives them the critical resistance perk.

Wabberspace.rscadd: A new belt type used by the Forest Garrison that includes their key and a needle.

Wabberspace.balance: Allows forrester armour to be sew-repaired.
Gives Forest Reaver a +1 speed statline, bringing them to parity with adults.
Replaces the Forest Guard's steel coifs with iron bevors.
Prevents the Forest Guard from taking on apprentices.
Raises Forest Guard slots to 4 to coincide with Ruffian influxes.
